  • Templates

Types

stbtt_buf {...}{.bycopy.} = object
  data*: ptr cuchar
  cursor*: cint
  size*: cint

stbtt_pack_context {...}{.bycopy.} = object
  user_allocator_context*: pointer
  pack_info*: pointer
  width*: cint
  height*: cint
  stride_in_bytes*: cint
  padding*: cint
  skip_missing*: cint
  h_oversample*: cuint
  v_oversample*: cuint
  pixels*: ptr cuchar
  nodes*: pointer

stbtt_bakedchar {...}{.bycopy.} = object
  x0*: cushort
  y0*: cushort
  x1*: cushort
  y1*: cushort
  xoff*: cfloat
  yoff*: cfloat
  xadvance*: cfloat

stbtt_aligned_quad {...}{.bycopy.} = object
  x0*: cfloat
  y0*: cfloat
  s0*: cfloat
  t0*: cfloat
  x1*: cfloat
  y1*: cfloat
  s1*: cfloat
  t1*: cfloat

stbtt_packedchar {...}{.bycopy.} = object
  x0*: cushort
  y0*: cushort
  x1*: cushort
  y1*: cushort
  xoff*: cfloat
  yoff*: cfloat
  xadvance*: cfloat
  xoff2*: cfloat
  yoff2*: cfloat

stbtt_pack_range {...}{.bycopy.} = object
  font_size*: cfloat
  first_unicode_codepoint_in_range*: cint
  array_of_unicode_codepoints*: ptr cint
  num_chars*: cint
  chardata_for_range*: ptr stbtt_packedchar
  h_oversample*: cuchar
  v_oversample*: cuchar

stbtt_fontinfo {...}{.bycopy.} = object
  userdata*: pointer
  data*: ptr cuchar
  fontstart*: cint
  numGlyphs*: cint
  loca*: cint
  head*: cint
  glyf*: cint
  hhea*: cint
  hmtx*: cint
  kern*: cint
  gpos*: cint
  svg*: cint
  index_map*: cint
  indexToLocFormat*: cint
  cff*: stbtt_buf
  charstrings*: stbtt_buf
  gsubrs*: stbtt_buf
  subrs*: stbtt_buf
  fontdicts*: stbtt_buf
  fdselect*: stbtt_buf

stbtt_bitmap {...}{.bycopy.} = object
  w*: cint
  h*: cint
  stride*: cint
  pixels*: ptr cuchar

stbtt_kerningentry {...}{.bycopy.} = object
  glyph1*: cint
  glyph2*: cint
  advance*: cint

stbrp_rect {...}{.bycopy.} = object
stbtt_vertex {...}{.bycopy.} = object
  x*: cshort
  y*: cshort
  cx*: cshort
  cy*: cshort
  cx1*: cshort
  cy1*: cshort
  padding*: cuchar

proc stbtt_BakeFontBitmap(data: ptr cuchar; offset: cint; pixel_height: cfloat;
                          pixels: ptr cuchar; pw: cint; ph: cint;
                          first_char: cint; num_chars: cint;
                          chardata: ptr stbtt_bakedchar): cint {...}{.importc.}
proc stbtt_GetBakedQuad(chardata: ptr stbtt_bakedchar; pw: cint; ph: cint;

                        q: ptr stbtt_aligned_quad; opengl_fillrule: cint) {...}{.
    importc.}

    importc.}

    importc.}
